description: Red Bull is a brand of energy drinks created and owned by the Austrian company Red Bull GmbH . With a market share of 43%, it is the most popular energy drink brand as of 2020, [ 8 ] and the third most valuable soft drink brand, behind Coca-Cola and Pepsi . [ 9 ] Since its launch in 1987, more than 100 billion cans of Red Bull have been sold worldwide, [ 10 ] including over 12.6 billion in 2024. [ 11 ]
